response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me and I believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection, given its worth of $10,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, I am offering you the chance to own it at a special price of $12,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a fair deal while also allowing me to appreciate the product's true worth. I look forward to your positive response. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 12000}
